Friends,

Your comments and reviews welcome on my recent webinar on API Facade
Pattern. This episode is on One Phase to Two Phase conversion.

API Facade Patterns: One Phase to Two Phase
Conversion<http://youtu.be/n8B-K3iJ7b4>

Let me know your views and thoughts on this.

regards,
Santanu
